application_settings.icons_help: Use this checkbox to reload the default Icons on the next restart. Warning: existing Icons will be deleted.
application_settings.locs_help: Use this checkbox to reload the default Locations on the next restart. Warning: existing Locations will be deleted.
application_settings.diag_help: Use this checkbox to turn application diagnostics information on and off. Diagnostics will be visible in the server logs.

datasources.name_help: A user-defined, unique name for the Datasource e.g. Internet Text, Crime scene images
datasources.type_help: Select the Datasource type. See the documentation for more information.
datasources.file_help: Upload the datasource archive file containing text and image data.
datasources.dbhost_help: The FQDN of the DB server e.g. database.domain.com
datasources.db_help: The name of the database hosted on the DB server that will be used.
datasources.username_help: The DB username that will be used to query text and image information.
datasources.password_help: The password for the DB username that will be used to query text and image information.
datasources.dbtable_host: The DB Table to be queried. See documentation for expected table structure.
datasources.whhost_help: The Host URL for the Webhook. See documentation for expected URL structure.

models.name_help: A user-defined, unique name for the Event that this Model will be used to detect e.g. Fire, Protest
models.train_help: Upload the dataset that will be used to train the Event Model to detect an occurance of that event
models.time_help: Specify a Time Frame for data points that would constitute an occurance of that event
models.area_help: Specify an Area for data points that would constitute an occurance of that event
models.keyword_help: Specify a Keyword that would constitute an occurance of this event
models.icon_help: Select an Icon that will be used to represent an occurance of this event on the map

icons.fa_help: A font-awesome icon tag class value (e.g. fas fa-ambulance)
icons.file_help: An image file (jpg, png, bmp, ico) that can be used as map marker (max size 64x64 pixels)
icons.eg_help: Text examples of what the Icon could represent

locations.add_name_help: A user-defined, unique name for the location
